document.heading: Marion S. Barry, Jr. Building Designation Act of 2020
To designate the District government building in Lot 20, Square 532, bounded by E Street, N.W., 4th Street, N.W., Indiana Avenue, N.W., and 3rd Street, N.W., as the Marion S. Barry, Jr. Building.

history.summary: Law 23-111 designates the District government building in Lot 20 in Square 532, bounded by E Street, N.W., Indiana Avenue, N.W., 4th Street, N.W., and 3rd Street, N.W., in Ward 6, as the Marion S. Barry Building.

document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Marion S. Barry, Jr. Building Designation Act of 2020".

section.text: Pursuant to sections 401 and 422 of the Street and Alley Closing and Acquisition Procedures Act of 1982, effective March 10, 1983 (D.C. Law 4-201; D.C. Official Code §§ 9-204.01 and 9-204.22), the Council designates the District government building in Lot 20, Square 532, bounded by E Street, N.W., 4th Street, N.W., Indiana Avenue, N.W., and 3rd Street, N.W., as the "Marion S. Barry, Jr. Building".

codify:street-designation-anno.action: the Council designates the District government building in Lot 20, Square 532, bounded by E Street, N.W., 4th Street, N.W., Indiana Avenue, N.W., and 3rd Street, N.W., as the "Marion S. Barry, Jr. Building

section.heading: Fiscal impact statement.
section.text: The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement in the committee report as the fiscal impact statement required by section 4a of the General Legislative Procedures Act of 1975, approved October 16, 2006 (120 Stat. 2038; D.C. Official Code § 1-301.47a).

section.heading: Effective date.
section.text: This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council to override the veto), a 30-day period of congressional review as provided in section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, approved December
24, 1973 (87 Stat. 813; D.C. Official Code § 1-206.02(c)(1)), and publication in the District of Columbia Register
